DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine if the concomitant administration of rifampin with BMS-708163 will affect the Pharmacokinetics of BMS-708163 and to assess safety and tolerability of co-administration BMS-708163 and rifampin
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and postmenopausal female subjects, 1855 yrs old inclusive Women of childbearing potential Tuberculosis
